entry.content:
Summary

Lightning talks from Friday evening.

Description

  • 00:00 - Intro to Lightning Talks - MC Larry Hasting

  • 41:20 - Julython - Robert Myers
  • 44:20 - CLDR: Common locale data repository - Martin von Löwis
  • 48:49 - Spine demo and Python port of runtime - Terry Simons

entry.title: Better Living Through Direnv
entry.summary:
Description

Never have to activate another virtualenv again? Yes, please! Remove the clutter of various API tokens that have accumulated in my shell configuration over the years? Yes, please! Use Direnv to automate your environment setup, removing pain points and barriers for your development team. We'll look at good, better …
entry.content:
Description

Never have to activate another virtualenv again? Yes, please! Remove the clutter of various API tokens that have accumulated in my shell configuration over the years? Yes, please! Use Direnv to automate your environment setup, removing pain points and barriers for your development team. We'll look at good, better, and best levels of managing environment variables with Direnv.
